author: tisi
title: Another neat mini Creator set!
review:
I collect mini Creator sets. I like them because those are small, creative and not too pricey sets. Now I'll rate this one.

Box/Instructions

Comes in a light blue canister which will be useful in the future for a kind of part storage. The instructions show the steps of three vehicles' build: a fire truck, a fire jeep and a helicopter.

Parts

Consists of 69 useful pieces in a great assortment. Plates, tiles, bricks and so on, mainly in red and light grey colour.

The build

I've tried firstly all of the 'official' vehicles. The fire truck is neat, maybe its front is too big. The jeep isn't bad, but not the best. The helicopter is a great idea, it's creative too. But the best part is when you build something by yourself! I made a lorry, a race car and a robot, so it's really a 'creator' set.

Summary

I like this one like the other mini creator sets. Maybe it's a little bit pricey, but it's full of ideas! In conclusion, it's a creative set with useful parts.

author: Chilly
title: Good parts for a small set
review:
After my Preston Stormer review got posted I realized I spelled dreaded wrong it's dreaded not treaded, stupid stupid stupid. but anyway I didn't stop review so here is my mini fire truck review, It transforms into a fire truck with a ladder, another fire truck without a ladder & a fire helicopter, Now lets get into pros & cons.

Pros

  • Pro 1 ladder can rotate 360
  • Pro 2 useful pieces such as http://www.brickset.com/parts/?part=4525464 or http://www.brickset.com/parts/?part=4640844 oh yeah http://www.brickset.com/parts/?part=368001 plus http://www.brickset.com/parts/?part=4540203 & many more just go to http://www.brickset.com/detail/?set=6911-1

Cons

  • Con 1 A bit pricy.    
Just because there's hardly any cons doesn't mean it's the greatest sets ever but still quite a nice little set.
